SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE emailinbox SET EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@ <%=,EmailServerUID=@@EmailServerUID@@%><%=,EmailInboxTitle=@@EmailInboxTitle@@%><%=,EmailInboxFrom=@@EmailInboxFrom@@%><%=,EmailInboxFromName=@@EmailInboxFromName@@%><%=,EmailInboxDate=@@EmailInboxDate@@%><%=,EmailInboxFilePath=@@EmailInboxFilePath@@%><%=,EmailInboxState=@@EmailInboxState@@%><%=,EmailInboxIsDel=@@EmailInboxIsDel@@%> WHERE EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@;

SELECT ei.EmailInboxID,ei.EmailServerUID,ei.EmailInboxTitle,ei.EmailInboxFrom,ei.EmailInboxFromName,ei.EmailInboxDate,ei.EmailInboxFilePath,ei.EmailInboxState,ei.EmailInboxIsDel FROM emailinbox AS ei WHERE 1=1 <%= AND ei.EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailServerUID=@@EmailServerUID@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxTitle=@@EmailInboxTitle@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxFrom=@@EmailInboxFrom@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxFromName=@@EmailInboxFromName@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxDate=@@EmailInboxDate@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxFilePath=@@EmailInboxFilePath@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxState=@@EmailInboxState@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxIsDel=@@EmailInboxIsDel@@%>;

SELECT ei.EmailInboxID,ei.EmailServerUID,ei.EmailInboxTitle,ei.EmailInboxFrom,ei.EmailInboxFromName,ei.EmailInboxDate,ei.EmailInboxFilePath,ei.EmailInboxState,ei.EmailInboxIsDel FROM emailinbox AS ei WHERE 1=1 <%= AND ei.EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailServerUID=@@EmailServerUID@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxTitle=@@EmailInboxTitle@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxFrom=@@EmailInboxFrom@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxFromName=@@EmailInboxFromName@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxDate=@@EmailInboxDate@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxFilePath=@@EmailInboxFilePath@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxState=@@EmailInboxState@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxIsDel=@@EmailInboxIsDel@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailinbox AS ei WHERE 1=1 <%= AND ei.EmailInboxID=@@EmailInboxID@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailServerUID=@@EmailServerUID@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxTitle=@@EmailInboxTitle@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxFrom=@@EmailInboxFrom@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxFromName=@@EmailInboxFromName@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxDate=@@EmailInboxDate@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxFilePath=@@EmailInboxFilePath@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxState=@@EmailInboxState@@%> <%= AND ei.EmailInboxIsDel=@@EmailInboxIsDel@@%>;
